gold.user: As a project manager, I want to retrieve all precomputations available in the Jira system to analyze their performance and usage across different projects.
gold.ideal: The API should return a list of all precomputations with their details, including IDs, names, and associated projects.

gold.user: As a data analyst, I need to update existing precomputations to reflect the latest changes in our data model and ensure accurate reporting.
gold.ideal: The API should accept a payload with updated precomputation details and return a success message along with the updated precomputation object.

gold.user: As a developer, I want to search for specific precomputations by their IDs to quickly access their configurations and make necessary adjustments.
gold.ideal: The API should return the precomputation details for the specified ID, including its parameters and any associated metadata.
